description: Ranathunga Arachchige Dushantha Gotabaya Wanshanath Bandara Vs Hon. W. Iranganie Perera, Chairperson, Debt Conciliation Board, and Nine Others - before Hon. Wickum A. Kaluarachchi, J
parties: Ranathunga Arachchige Dushantha Gotabaya Wanshanath Bandara Vs Hon. W. Iranganie Perera, Chairperson, Debt Conciliation Board, and Nine Others -
keywords: -Jurisdiction of the Debt Conciliation Board. -Contradictory prayers cannot be maintained. -Application of Section 54 (1) of the Debt Conciliation Ordinance. -Power of the Debt Conciliation Board to decide whether a deed is a Transfer or a Mortgage. -Nullity of a Deed of Transfer executed without the written sanction of the Debt Conciliation Board after a Notice registered under Section 35 (2).
